meanings.sent1: In the aquarium, the octopodes swam gracefully in their tank.
meanings.sent2: The octopodes in the ocean were fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent3: The octopodes decided to have a race to see who could reach the treasure first.
meanings.sent4: The octopodes in the deep sea seemed like mystical creatures from another world.
meanings.sent5: The octopodes changed colors to blend in with their surroundings, showing their incredible camouflage abilities.

meanings.sent1: The octopodes at the marine center were well taken care of by the staff.
meanings.sent2: Scientists were excited to study the behavior of the octopodes in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The octopodes threw a party to celebrate their underwater kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The octopodes in the story symbolized teamwork and cooperation.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the octopodes' ability to squeeze through tiny openings with ease.
